Sign Up

The Waiter That's Always Waiting.

We've created the fastest and easiest way for customers to order from pub, bar and restaurant menus.
No apps no aggravation.
Queue Pay takes orders in as little as seconds.

Out With The Old

Gone are the days of clunk and lifeless mobile ordering apps. Queue Pay works through a website to provide a customised, accessible experience distinct to each venue. Build your menu just how you want it, or better yet, we can built it for you.

Que-ching

We use the Stripe Payment Plaform to let your customers pay in the easiest and most secure ways - like Apple Pay and Google Pay - as well as to make sure you receive payment with little to no hassle.

Easy for All

Whether it be the start of the end of the evening, customers find Queue Pay consistently foolproof - no matter how young, old, or deep into the rounds they may be. All it takes is a scan or a tap.
